name: @node-ipc/event-pubsub
description: Super light and fast Extensible ES6+ events and EventEmitters for Node and the browser. Easy for any developer level, use the same exact code in node and the browser. No frills, just high speed events!

scripts.coverage: yarn emulate && c8 -r lcov -r html node test/CI-coverage.js && c8 report
scripts.emulate: yarn && node ./build.cjs && copyfiles -V "./!(node_modules)/*" "./**!(node_modules)"  "./example/node_modules/@node-ipc/event-pubsub/" && copyfiles -V "./node_modules/**/*" "./example/" && copyfiles -V "./!(node_modules)/*" "./**!(node_modules)"  "./test/node_modules/@node-ipc/event-pubsub/" && copyfiles -V "./node_modules/**/*" "./test/"

author: Brandon Nozaki Miller
